data.name: Moet & Chandon Champagne Bottle
data.description: A bottle from 1980s Moet & Chandon, with a unique signature of the Champagne label.

data.name: Bibi Graetz Colore 20th Anniversary Label 2019
data.description: Colore is the highest expression of Bibi Graetz dream. The drive of this wine is to create a pure excellence of Tuscany, a wine made with traditional Tuscan grapes sourced from some of the oldest and rarest vineyards of the region. Sangiovese represent the structure and the power of the wine, Colorino fruits and velvety tannins, Canaiolo minerality and intensity. On the best few barrels of the whole production will become Colore.

data.name: Saxum James Berry Vineyard (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2014
data.description: A dramatic wine that weds power and opulence, maintaining impeccable balance along the way. Brooding dark berry and loamy mineral aromas lead to rich flavors of currant, licorice, dried sage and smoky pepper.
data.country: USA, Paso Robles, Central Coast, California

data.name: Pride Mountain Vineyards Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon (1.5 Liter Magnum) 2003
data.description: Our Reserve Cabernet is made from our oldest and most expressive vineyard blocks of Clone 7 Cabernet and is aged in barrel 6 months longer compared to our Pride and Vintner Select cuvees.
data.country: USA, St. Helena, Napa Valley, California
